column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday February 7 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: Royster Rd between Winchester Rd and Briar Hill Rd
column5: The roadway is shut down to thru traffic until further notice due to a serious single vehicle collision.

column3: UPDATE 2/7 - Rosemont Garden at Southland Dr / Lafayette Pkwy
column4: The intersection is back open following repairs on a large water main break and damaged communication lines.
